hero.title: NeuroCare
hero.subtitle: Understand yourself. Connect deeply.
hero.mindUnique: Your mind is unique. Let's explore it.

testSection.title: Choose Your Journey
testSection.description: Each test reveals different aspects of your personality. Start with MBTI and unlock deeper insights about yourself.

mbti.title: MBTI
mbti.description: Discover your personality through AI precision. Understand your cognitive preferences and how you interact with the world.

bigFive.title: Big Five
bigFive.description: Explore the five fundamental dimensions of personality that shape who you are.

enneagram.title: Enneagram
enneagram.description: Uncover your core motivations and fears through this ancient wisdom system.

eq.title: Emotional Intelligence
eq.description: Measure your ability to understand and manage emotions effectively.
